Tap_Type_and_Enter.name: Tap_Type_and_Enter
Tap_Type_and_Enter.description: Tap an input box at position (x, y), Type the "text", and then perform the Enter operation. Very useful for searching and sending messages!
Tap_Type_and_Enter.precondition: There is a text input box on the screen with no previously entered content.

Search_Location_On_Maps.name: Search_Location_On_Maps
Search_Location_On_Maps.description: Tap the search bar in Google Maps at position (x, y), type the location name (text), and perform the search to display the location on the map.
Search_Location_On_Maps.precondition: The Google Maps app is open, and the search bar is visible on the screen.
